Who likes saving a few bucks? Especially on Black Friday right? Well here you go it's time to save some more!  We have 3 absolutely lovely plans on offer today in variations of monthly and yearly including a **NEW 512MB $19/YR SPECIAL!**

Valid for Monthly and Quarter Terms.
 
If you would like to find out more about us please view:  [Our Company](http://www.dedicatedminds.com/about-us.html) or Shoot us a message: **Sales@DedicatedMinds.com**
 
 Our current **[Budget VPS Hosting](http://www.dedicatedminds.com/budget-vps-hosting.html)** Plans are in the **Clifton, New Jersey!**
 

###Company Facts

  1. 99.99% Network Uptime Guarantee -- We've had 100%!
  2. Knowledgeable & Helpful 24x7 Support
  3. Realistic pricing for realistic resources
  4. Premium Network Providers covering NYC & Europe
  5. Simplistic, Easy to use Control Panel based on SolusVM
  6. Our Priority is strictly helping YOU & YOUR Business
  7.  **Not happy? **7 Day Money Back Guarantee!


###VPS Hosting Facts

  1. Dual Quadcore Xeon CPU's (E5620 @2.4Ghz w/HT)
  2. Either 4x / 8x SATA RAID10 Storage (Depending on node/location)
  3. Enterprise branded SERVER GRADE HARDWARE!
  4. Premium Network Providers USA & Europe.
  5. Simplistic, Easy to use Control Panel based on SolusVM
  6. Upto 5 IP's with each VPS (Upon  valid Justification)
  7. 15+ Linux OS Templates to choose from!
  8.  15% Discount if you noticed this last fact! Coupon: W15
